mapper.update:
UPDATE assist_rank SET
assist_rank.Assistants = #{ assistants },
assist_rank.PlayerId = #{ playerId },
assist_rank.PreRanking = #{ preRanking },
assist_rank.Ranking = #{ ranking },
assist_rank.Year = #{ year },
assist_rank.EndYear = #{ endYear },
assist_rank.ClubId = #{ clubId },
assist_rank.ClubLogo = #{ clubLogo },
assist_rank.ClubName = #{ clubName },
assist_rank.ClubEnglishName = #{ clubEnglishName },
assist_rank.ClubFullName = #{ clubFullName },
assist_rank.ClubEnglishFullName = #{ clubEnglishFullName },
assist_rank.PlayerName = #{ playerName },
assist_rank.PlayerEnglishName = #{ playerEnglishName },
assist_rank.Country = #{ country },
assist_rank.NativePlace = #{ nativePlace },
assist_rank.Birth = #{ birth }
WHERE id= #{id}
